mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAMPINGREVIEW(CGRVCODE, CGRVMID, CGRVCACODE, CGRVTITLE, CGRVCONTENTS, CGRVDATE, CGRVSTATE, CGRVRECODE,CGRVHITS,CGRVSTARATING) VALUES(#{cgrvcode}, #{cgrvmid}, #{cgrvcacode}, #{cgrvtitle}, #{cgrvcontents}, SYSDATE, 1, #{cgrvrecode}, 0, #{cgrvstarating})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CA.CAIMAGE, CA.CANAME, CG.CGRVRECODE, CGRVCODE, CGRVMID, CGRVCACODE, CGRVTITLE, CGRVCONTENTS, TO_CHAR(CGRVDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')AS CGRVDATE, CGRVSTATE, CGRVHITS, CGRVSTARATING FROM CAMPINGREVIEW CG, RESERVATION RE, CAMPING CA WHERE CG.CGRVCACODE = RE.RECACODE AND CA.CACODE = RE.RECACODE AND CG.CGRVRECODE = RE.RECODE AND CGRVSTATE = 1 ORDER BY CGRVCODE

SELECT DISTINCT CA.CAIMAGE, CA.CANAME, CG.CGRVRECODE, CGRVCODE, CGRVMID, CGRVCACODE, CGRVTITLE, CGRVCONTENTS, TO_CHAR(CGRVDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')AS CGRVDATE, CGRVSTATE, CGRVHITS, CGRVSTARATING FROM CAMPINGREVIEW CG, RESERVATION RE, CAMPING CA WHERE CG.CGRVCACODE = RE.RECACODE AND CA.CACODE = RE.RECACODE AND CG.CGRVRECODE = RE.RECODE AND CGRVCODE = #{cgrvcode} AND CGRVSTATE = 1 ORDER BY CGRVCODE
mapper.update: UPDATE CAMPINGREVIEW SET CGRVHITS = CGRVHITS+1 WHERE CGRVCODE = #{cgrvcode}
UPDATE CAMPINGREVIEW SET CGRVSTATE = 0 WHERE CGRVCODE = #{cgrvcode}
mapper.select: SELECT AVG(CGRVSTARATING) AS CASTARAVG FROM CAMPINGREVIEW CG, CAMPING CP WHERE CP.CACODE = #{cacode} AND CG.CGRVCACODE = CP.CACODE
